Nighlight/Windlord::

Nightlight tried to left the pod, Windlord moved and grabbed her 
towrds  three where he put her down and left her rest. Windlord 
walked some steps towards the pod and said at aerotur "I think that 
her circuits are demaged... I could check the pod's control pad but I 
coudn't find out a lot... Can you and Trinitry attend the femme while 
I'm working -I try don't delay so much..."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She looked up at Aerotaur. "It's OK, she's nice." She looked at the 
> bot's face. Then she looked down and realized she was stepping on 
the 
> bot's wings."Opps. Sorry." She walked to the side of the pod and 
> tried to climb out. She stood on the very edge of the side, then 
fell 
> off. She landed on a clump of plants."Oohhfff."
